build.script:
export NODE_PATH="/opt/homebrew/lib/node_modules"
babel www/assets/scripts/src -d www/assets/scripts/build
sass --style compressed --no-source-map www/assets/css/src:www/assets/css/build

run.script:
export NODE_PATH="/opt/homebrew/lib/node_modules"
babel --watch www/assets/scripts/src -d www/assets/scripts/build &
sass --watch --style compressed --no-source-map www/assets/css/src:www/assets/css/build
